top.title: Israeli settlers set fire to Palestinian warehouse and land as West Bank attacks surge
top.summary: Several Palestinians were also injured when settlers launched arson attacks targeting an industrial area, a Bedouin village, and farmland east of Tulkarm.

top.title: Trump says he has 'obligation' to sue BBC over speech edit
top.summary: The US president indicates he will go ahead with a lawsuit against the BBC over how his speech was presented by Panorama.

top.title: Fog helps Russian forces push deeper into key Ukrainian city of Pokrovsk
top.summary: A video has gone viral showing Russian soldiers openly driving into the city on civilian cars and motorbikes.

top.title: UK seeking to curb AI child sex abuse imagery with tougher testing
top.summary: A new law will allow authorised testers to assess AI models for their ability to generate abuse material

top.title: New consoles used to come out every five years – so where's the PlayStation 6?
top.summary: On the fifth anniversary of the PlayStation 5, the firm says its focus remains on its current console.

top.title: Two popular gay dating platforms removed from Apple app store in China
top.summary: The removal of Blued and Finka has raised concerns amongst the LGBT community in the country.

title.#text: The first Toy Story 5 teaser threatens the toys with a tablet
Insta360’s new accessories turn its Ace Pro 2 into an instant camera
Samsung’s new 27-inch portable display has a three-hour battery life
